src:
Petition to keep Wonho in Monsta X gathers more than 400k signatures.
03 Nov 2019, 03:46 by greenbird



Guys! The petition for Wonho to stay in Monsta X has now around 409k signatures.
Click the link ->Petition <- if you would like to also give it a try and help!
